DOC.detailed_description: The aim control double-blind randomized 3-session cross-over design study evaluate effect single dose 150 mg 14-day repeat dose 300 mg bupropion ( therapeutic dose ) cognitive executive function , behaviour subjective feeling , physical parameter sleep deprivation 12 train healthy volunteer ( 18-35 year old ) . Cognitive executive function assess reaction time , critical flicker fusion test , Stroop test , digit symbol substitution test , span test short term recal picture , tap track test . Behaviour subjective effect explore : - feeling frequently experience psychotropic drug assess ARCI , - mood state tension , depression , anger , vigor , fatigue confusion assess POMS Norris visual analogic scale , - sleep assess LSEQ , - feed behaviour assess food intake meal test self-ratings appetite satiety , Physical parameter : - rest orthostatic blood pressure heart rate , - body temperature weight . Bupropion test versus placebo 20 mg methylphenidate positive control . Each subject receive 3 treatment , sequently randomize , 17-day wash-out period session . Each session organize follow : - 2 20-hour hospitalisation consist adverse effect review , physical examination , test training , sleep deprivation , drug compliance evaluation , drug dose dispensation , assessment describe , - 2 visit consist adverse effect review , drug compliance evaluation drug dispensation .
